content: as Val, tell me - remembering that your relationship with the ship as chief engineer is a bit objectum, and he's a jealous creature - what it was like in those three months you were apart, how you came to worry that your distraction thinking about and longing for Odyl was going to cause you to make a mistake that would cost lives, and why you believed that could happen, and when you realized that you couldn't stop this, and it was time to retire from DSES and start a new life.
